{"step_by_step_thinking": "Palatal secretions can affect the setting of impression materials due to their hydrophilic nature. Silicone impression materials are hydrophobic and are not affected by palatal secretions. Agar-agar is a reversible hydrocolloid material and is also not affected by palatal secretions. Impression paste and impression plaster are both affected by palatal secretions because they are hydrophilic materials. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Impression paste.", "answer_choice": "C"}
